car.name: Inside a car
car.description: You are inside your car in the driver seat. The night is dark but you see a metal fence caught in your headlights.
car.search_light: You can see a lighter and a couple of coins on the shelf. You also notice a pack of cigarettes on a front seat.
car.search_dark: You can't see much inside a car since the lights are off. You see a couple of lights flickering on a dashboard.

lounge.name: In a lounge
lounge.description: A comfy lounge with a sofa.

kitchen.name: In the kitchen
kitchen.description: Small kitchen with sink and silverware.
